Question
========

To identify outliers ("outliers") of a variable, one can look at the standardized residuals ("studentized residuals"). What values are typically considered extreme? 
Answerlist
----------
* Absolute values greater than 1
* Absolute values greater than 2
* Absolute values greater than 3
* Absolute values greater than 10

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
